bn.base

Class Domain

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractSet<E>
        • bn.util.ArraySet<Value>
          • bn.base.Domain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Domain, java.lang.Iterable<Value>, java.util.Collection<Value>, java.util.Set<Value>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanDomain

    public class Domain
extends ArraySet<Value>
implements Domain
    Base implementation of a Domain as an ArraySet of Values. We use a ArraySet here since iteration is the main use for Domains in Bayesian network algorithms.
